title: Speaker NA enquired about health of Sheikh Rashid
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 14 (APP):Speaker National Assembly Asad Qaiser on Sunday telephoned Minister for Railways Sheikh Rashid Ahmed and enquired about his health.
Asad Qaiser extended best wishes to Minister for Railway as Sheikh Rashid tested positive of Covid-19 a couple of days ago.
The Speaker also prayed for the speedy recovery of Sheikh Rashid Ahmed.
Sheikh Rashid thanked the Speaker for his best wishes and prayers.
